ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime

Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.funtime_runtime.Answer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Answer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a model class for answers Answers consists of a body, user, list of replies, rating, date and number of replies Answer can also consist of a Photo, if it is attached
    Author:
    Pranjali Pokharel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
